page.title: 05BODFARI COMMUNITY COUNCIL
page.content: In 1985 the community council bought some land that was the site of an old derelict quarry near the old Bodfari School.They hope to develope the area as a playground for the children of the village. At present there is no playground for the children in the parish of Bodfari, though there is one in the parish of Aberwheeler on the other side of the busy A541. The council hope to include slides and swings as well as erecting goal posts.It is also hoped to have a bowling green, picnic area and a toilet block.An access road from the A541 will have to be built.It is expected that the project will take about two years to be completed.
